Motor

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Motor.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Test

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Juhis5 on 27.11.2015. Game class is the main class of the engine. It holds the default canvas and all the gameObjects and loops the game.

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructor. Initializes the game by calling the initialize() method.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method starts the game and runs it in a loop. Method is designed to cap fps into give fps.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method updates all the GameObjectby calling their update method. Method is called repeatedly while game is running.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method will set up everything needed for the game to run
